reviews.review:
[h1]Why buy this when the original GoldSource version is better?[/h1]

The infamous buggy version of Half-Life. There is literally nothing good about this. The biggest problem is that this is a bad port. Textures are broken, some important set-pieces are bugged, the enemy A.I. is very dodgy and the player movement is somehow more slippery than the original goldsource version.
Complete waste of money.

以后再也不敢说自己不晕3D游戏了，顺便，建议游戏顺序HL1-OP-BS-HL2-HL2EP1-HL2EP2，说起来为什么一个毫无诚意的重置你们都给好评？
玩了一下针锋相对，果断改了好评。
HALF LIFE ES MI SAGA FAVORITA DE STEAM
БОЖЕСТВЕННА

Actually better then half life 2, not just half life source but half life 1 in general

Where to begin!? 

This game is fantastic. It is hard, it's creepy, it's great in so many ways. Screw modern brainless AAA-shooters that's simply reskins from the last version (no names mentioned) the old school shooters are top notch. Maybe not as beautiful as the modern titles, but where has gaming come if looks are all we care about?

It's a must play in my opinion!

Dies ist mein erstes Half-Life Spiel welches ich spiele, die nostalgie spielt also keine Rolle und ich bewerte das Spiel als ob es heute veröffentlicht wurde.

Pro:
-Relativ lang für so ein spiel
-kleine aber feine story
-coole waffen
-kein gescripte welches den spieler einschränkt, volle möglichkeiten zur entfaltung
-kurze ladezeiten
-Der spieler wird ohne direkten eingriff durch text oder irgentwelche UI-Elemente gelenkt, nähmlich durch reines LvL-    Design
-movement ist flüssig und schnell, oder langsam und gesteuert, je wie man will

Contra:
-Hatt ein paar Bugs, voralldingen Sound bugs.
-Grafik ist echt schlecht

Fazi:Ein Spiel welches dem #PcMasterreace gerecht wird, kauft am besten gleich das geseamtpacket im sale.

So, Half-Life is a game. A game that has a man with glasses and a ponytail shooting aliens. Now for the people that aren't hard for shooting aliens, you can also shoot middle-aged men in security outfits and old men in lab coats.

This is not the original Half-Life. This is instead a Source port of Half-Life. This game was to tell a good story with the FPS gameplay and puzzles, however the game I received involved Gabe "Gaben" Newell introducing me to "Half-Life" by telling me, and I quote: "Welcome to Team Fortress 2..." and that's when I knew, I didn't have Half-Life.

I received this through an email from Gabe Newell himself and the subject was "The Game you Always Desired!" and that's when my jaw dropped. I LOVE Valve and to receive an email from Gabe himself made me extremely excited, and him recommending me a game that I "Always Desired" made me INCREDIBLY joyous.

However, the file was "Half-Life: Source.exe" and that's when I thought, "Hey, hold up! I've played Half-Life before today." I scratched my noggin and shrugged my shoulders. I honestly don't know how Gabe Newell could send a file bigger than 25MB on Gmail when 25MB is Gmail's file size limit, but I assume it's because he is the God of all Gods.

Anyway, as I said. I started up the file and was greeted by a black screen and had Gabe's soulful voice, with reverb, fill my ears. "Welcome to Team Fortress 2..." and that's when the screen showed actual textures. This wasn't Half-Life, nor Source, nor GoldSrc. This was, to my knowledge, Unreal Engine 4. This wasn't the Valve I once knew. Why would Gabe use Unreal Engine 4 and not, say, Source/Source 2? It stated at the bottom of the email in [b]bold[/b] and [i]italics[/i] "I used Unreal Engine 4 because, Source 2 wasn't ready and Source and GoldSrc was too old for me: Gaben."

So, I was on my toes this time. Obviously not literally. But, my screen showed barely visable textures with a very bright light shrouding it, the textures barely visible. I had to wear special [b]Special Gamer Sunglasses for Pro Gamers™[/b] to make it slightly bearable. By this point, I lost track of what Gabe was saying, from the part I heard it went something like "...special light functions that we have delightfully stolen from Unreal Engine 4 and sprinkled into Source 2..." and something along the lines of "...Source can't actually do this. Source is too old and is not what it once was to handle lighting like this...". I finally listened to what he was saying fully. And that's when the lighting presentation ended. I could finally take off the [b]Special Gamer Sunglasses for Pro Gamers™[/b]...for now at least.

I pressed the W key and walked forward. Gabe told me how "this game is revolutionary and will revolutionize the Team Fortress franchise...". I squinted my eyes. This was not Half-Life. I thought that the audio clip at the start, the "Welcome to Team Fortress 2..." clip, was a mistake. A glitch, so to say. Anyway, this may've still been a glitch, but it's happened twice which, when it comes to Gabe and Valve, is unlikely.

Putting on my [b]Special Gamer Glitch Glasses for Pro Gamers™[/b], which can detect whether something's a glitch, or intentional. They detected that this, this was intentional. However, this is NOT Team Fortress 2. This didn't have the Team Fortress 2 art style, and the file name had nothing to do with Team Fortress, nor TF2. This file name was, as mentioned above, "Half-Life Source.exe". So, at that point, I was confused.

I continued on to the weapon & shooting showcase and it dropped me in an area, literally dropped me in, that looked like Black Mesa. I had to fight against bots, with an angry Gabe shouting in my ear; the reverb of his voice increased, becoming deafening. He shouted things like, "GO ON! SHOOT THAT DAMN HEADCRAB!" and, "YEAH YOU STUPID VORTIGAUNT! TAKE THAT! YEAH!" he was getting louder until I had to eventually take off my headphones.

I finally completed the fighting showcase and my heart was pounding. Fast forward to the end of the demonstration and a bright light fills my screen. It was a Headcrab that swallowed a bulb that latched onto my head. The screen was white, Gabe's voice: inaudible. And then, a flash. Half-Life 3's logo. Was this a promo for Half-Life 3? Maybe. But, why did it mention Team Fortress 2? Perhaps it was a joke mod. But, it can't be. It was sent by Gabe Newell himself. So, I'm unsure.

All in all, Half-Life: Source is a good port.

Крутая игра, понравилась мне тем что нужно проходить миссии, и уже за несколько лет прошел игру 3 раза, был бы момент сел бы и прошел 4 раз, а пока я останусь в роли G-man загадочного персонажа всей франшизы полураспада. Играл во все дополнения и прошел все миссии ХФ:2 и все дополнения к ней. С нетерпением жду уже несколько лет ХФ:3! гейб давай уже рожай!

You can no longer sit down in the train.
2/10
장비를 정지합니다

This game is awful. Not Half-Life itself, Half-Life it self is one of my favorite games of all time, but this port is god awful. I could never get it running stably, there's an unacceptable amount of bugs, visual and game play related, and it just looks down right weird with the Source lighting and water textures. 

Do not buy this version of Half-Life. Buy the original GoldSrc game on steam. It's much better in almost every way.

Half Life: Source je původní Half Life, který ovšem běží na Source Engine a né na Goldsrc. Každopádně jedna z nejlepších a nejvíce pokrokových her historie, která vystoupila z koridoru her typu Doom a udává základ moderních FPS her. Toď krátké představení...
Gordon Freeman, obyčejný vědec který dostane nabídku pracovat ve výzkumném komplexu Black Mesa, přijíždí hned první den pozdě do práce. Ovšem neví co se stane za katastrofu... nebudu tady spojlovat, protože ten kdo jí nehrál se nemůže nazývat hráč! Mnoho příšer, mariňáci, málo přátel, bosové, mnoho zbraní, mnoho emocí, těžkých okamžoků a mnoho dalšího!

PLUSY:
+Úžasné prostředí zničené Black Mesy
+Mnoho typů nepřátel
+Soundtrack
+Zbraně
+Vylepšená grafika od původního dílu
+Hratelnost
+HD Texture Pack
+Mnoho odkazů na pozdější díly
+Multiplayer
+Nízké HW požadavky
+Gordon Freeman

MÍNUSY:
-Delší loadingy
-Občasné bugy
-AI nepřátel (samozřejmě berme s nadhledem, přece jenom je to pořád hra z roku 1998 a Source Engine přídává jen lepší grafiku a odlesky vody)

HODNOCENÍ: 95%
Brings back the memories :,)
Sollte jeder mal gespielt haben der sich für Shooter und seine Anfänge interessiert :DDD

COMPRE O BLACK-MESA
Esse game é simplesmente sensacional, a história, a fisica, tudo! O game em geral é bem legal, apesar dessa versão source não mude nada em realação ao original, somente a água, mas se tiver a oportunidade de comprar o source, pode comprar, é uma melhoria então é lucro.
Notas finais:
História: 10/10;
Jogabilidade: 9,8/10;
Gameplay: 9,5/10
Um dos maiores problemas que enfrentei na hora do game, foi os objetivos, o jogo não fala onde você deve ir, me perdi muitas vezes por conta disso, sei lá, mas acho isso chato.
Remasterização 4,5/10
Pequenas melhorias, mas não tão relevantes.
Nota final: 9,9/10
Amazing atmosphere, IMO is better than HL2
Jogo top!!!! Muito bom mesmo.

De ahí en más, entiendo su importancia.

명자크

Good game if you like seeing the evolution of games that are specifically valve or just FPS games in general. It is one of the first games that pioneered the use of linear story telling in an fps game because before this we had games that just had only gameplay like doom or games that were multiplayer focused. If the low res graphics really bug you for some strange reason even though the original Non-Source Engine version was made in 1998 then get the Black Mesa Source remake. Compared to the original you will gain better settings, lighting effects, and ragdoll physics but you will loose built in multiplayer and you will gain a different set of glitches that are more noticable due to the fact that valve just ran the original game through the source engine and never changed anything.

Уровни разнообразны, всё вокруг взрывается, телепортируется и неведомые фиговины!!!
На максимальной сложности чувствуется челлендж. До сих пор приятно играть.
Улучшеный графон правда ни к чему.

[h1]Неплохой ремейк легендарной игры[/h1]
Многим игрокам не нравится Half-Life: Source из-за багов и не сильно извенённой (в отличии от оригинала) графикой, и они предпочитают [i]Black Mesa[/i]. Если вы ни разу не играли в Half-Life, можете купить оригинальную или BS (но в Black Mesa не доделаны последние главы). Если вы уже играли и в Half-Life, и в BS, и хотите перепройти HL, можете попробовать. Мне лично игра понравилась. В ней изменено меню в стиле Half-Life 2, вода. Текстуры и модели не изменены, но играть можно.
Также поклонникам стрелялок "во всех подряд" по сети советую поиграть в [i]Half-Life Deathmatch: Source[/i], которая идёт вместе с Half-Life: Source.

[b]Плюсы:[/b]
1. Изменено меню
2. Новая вода
3. Можно начать с любой главы
4. Можно изменить сложность во время игры
5. Ностальгия

[b]Минусы:[/b]
1. Есть баги
2. Текстуры и модели не изменены

ここまでそっくりそのまま再現(移植)しなくても……というくらい、見た目も内容もほぼそのまんまのリメイクです。
見た目で変わったところといえば、水の表現がHL2同様綺麗になったことくらいでしょうか。
背景やキャラクターのモデルやテクスチャーなどは原版そのままっぽいので、劇的にキレイになったHL1を期待すると少々がっかりします。
そういう人は「BLACK MESA」を遊びましょう、ということかな。

ゲーム内容自体はHL1そのままなので文句なく面白いです。
ただMODを入れないと、ゲーム中のキャラクターのセリフなどの字幕は(キャプション設定をONにしても)出ないので要注意。

操作感覚もほぼそのままだと思うのですが、デフォルトの移動スピードが速すぎるのと、移動に少し慣性がついているせいか、狭い足場の上を移動するとき、しょっちゅう足を踏み外してゲームオーバーになったりするのがちょっとイライラするかも。

Буду краток.

Многие люди очень сильно хвалят Half-Life. Многие до сих пор ждут 3 часть. Помнится, я попробовал приобщиться к серии через 2 часть. Вроде интересно, но не такой уж и шедевр. Тогда мне в голову закралась мысль: "А что если 1 часть хороша?". Но я очень долго откладывал прохождение. О чём я теперь очень жалею.

Half-Life это, не побоюсь этого слова, шедевр. В игре превосходно абсолютно всё: атмосфера, геймплей, дизайн уровней, враги.

Моя оценка 10 хедкрабов из 10.
讲真，我有点后悔买了这款游戏。选项里有字幕但是根本就不会显示字幕，重置也是BUG多多，最恶心的就是队友被咬了之后叫个不停，带两个科学家出去浪被咬一下就爽的停不下来。不过在光影方面还是蛮可观的，但有什么用呢？
It's Half-Life for God sake, don't need reviews. :)

"Good morning, and welcome to the Black Mesa transit system. 
This automated train is provided for the security and convenience of 
the Black Mesa Research Facility personnel. The time is 8:47 A.M. 
Current topside temperature is 93 degrees with an estimated high of 
105. The Black Mesa compound is maintained at a pleasant 68 degrees at 
all times. This train is inbound from level 3 dormitories to sector C 
test labs and control facilities. If your intended destination is a 
high security area beyond sector C, you will need to return to the 
central transit hub in area 9 and board a high security train. If you 
have not yet submitted your identity to the retinal clearance system, 
you must report to Black Mesa personnel for processing before you will 
be permitted into the high security branch of the transit system.

"Due to the high toxicity of material routinely handled in the Black 
Mesa compound, no smoking, eating, or drinking are permitted within the 
Black Mesa transit system. Please keep your limbs inside the train at 
all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to 
a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, 
passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is 
necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated 
first. Please, stay away from electrified rails and proceed to an 
emergency station until assistance arrives. "

A reminder: that the Black Mesa Hazard Course decathalon 
will commence this evening at 1900 hours in the Level 3 facility. The 
semi-finals for high security personnel will be announced in a separate 
secure broadcast transmission. Remember: more lives than yours may 
depend on your fitness.

"Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to 
the Black Mesa Team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of: 
materials handling, and low clearance security. Please contact Black 
Mesa personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a 
background in the areas of: theoretical physics, biotechnology, or 
other high-tech disciplines, please contact our civilian recruiting 
team. The Black Mesa Facility is an equal opportunity employer. 

"A reminder to all Black Mesa personnel: regular radiation and 
biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the 
Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or 
radiation checkup is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you 
have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the 
course of your duties, contact your radiation safety officer 
immediately. Work safe, work smart. Your future depends on it."

"Now arriving at sector C test labs and control facilities. 
Please stand back from the automated door, and wait for the security 
officer to verify your identity. Before exiting the train, be sure to 
check your area for personal belongings. Thank you, and have a very 
safe and productive day."
Wow realy nice game

The only real way to play half-life 1 if you're pc can't support opengl. But either way it's half-life 1 with some upgrades like water and ragdolls really. So i would recommend if you're only buying it since half-life lag's on the OpenGL render
Genialna gra o raz fabuła :)

Just get the Original Half-Life. 

Half-Life: Source has been in an unfinished state for years and is considered to be abandonded. Until the workers at Valve decide to gather up a team themselves to polish up the game (which is super unlikley sense they're so fixated on VR right now and it would take a miracle if someone at Valve even wanted to work on HL:S), I would stay away from Half-Life: Source until that happens.

Yeah, it's pretty good.
Spent an hour or so afterwards listening to fan theories and such, because despite the enjoyable gameplay which was beyond what I expected, the story is where this game excelled. Oddly you could pass through the whole thing without even a whiff of story until the final chapter, but if you pay attention, as I tried to, the story is intruging and far more important, in my opinion, than anything else.
Go play it.

Es una pena no haber jugado Half Life en 1998. Tal vez estuve ocupado en aquel entonces con Doom 2, Quake 2 y FIFA 98, juegos a los que le dedique mucho tiempo. Hoy no se disfruta igual, ya estoy acostumbrado a otros FPS pero en su momento Half Life debio haber marcado un nuevo rumbo en la historia de los video juegos. Hoy es solo un juego con graficos regulares (aunque la version source permite habilitar contenido HD) pero con una buena historia y que te obliga a resolver situaciones para avanzar en el juego.

Este juego se lo recomiendo a quienes jugaron la version original y quieren tener una version "mejorada" y mas pulida.
It's good but it's quite buggy.

Cool game but I just finished playing half-life / half-life sorce and it's the same game i dint not notice any difference between the two just my opinion 1967kID opposing force or blue shift next this week game on and enjoy it was a blast and I have pasted all half-life mods in the 90s - 2000 this game was way before it's time it's even better than lats of the new games out today
Efsane Half-life'ın source ile yeniden yapımı su dışında görsellerde çok bir iyileşme yok black mesayi tercih ederim am sevilmeyecek bir yönü yok

Half-Life, the original game from 1998, is possibly my favorite game of all time for reasons of nostalgia, gameplay, story, and the fact that I don't mind the graphics. That being said... This version has taken that amazing game, ported it to the same engine as Half-Life 2, and neglected to fix the [i] massive [/i] glitches. These include weapons that do not work properly, several graphical problems (If you use the flashlight in a few rooms, the visuals just about break.) Sure, the graphics are 'better' but all that is changed is the blood, lighting and the added ragdoll physics. But these clash with the textures, all of them much lower resolution, making the game look [i] worse	[/i]. I reccomend the original Half-Life, as well as it's expansions and sequels. And if you can't stand the graphics, then I reccomend Black Mesa Source, after the original game. It's a [i] much	[/i] better remake of the original Half-Life.

Klasika mezi FPS hrami. Skvělý příběh a skvělá atmosféra. Upravená grafika je také fajn. Ač sem hře musel chvilku přicházet na chuť, tak ve finále jsem si jí užil. Tohle byla střílečka, u které člověk musí setsakramenstky používat hlavu a ne jen zběsile držet levé tlačítko na myši. Občas jsem byl pěkně vydeptaný z toho, že jsem nevěděl jak dál, ale o tom to je. 7/10

Serious Review

As much as I love the Half Life series, I recommend that the original Half Life be played first before this iteration. Yes, it had a graphical and engine update but so what. The gameplay itself was tampered with.....it was made easier, even on "Hard" there is a noticeable difference between Hard on this source version and the original. In Blast Pit there has been an extra npc placed that stands at the top of the platform continuously shooting the "tentacles"(and for some reason never dies), which completely ruined the tension that was there previously.

Almost a walk in the park.
Various apects of the gameplay are horribly broken. DO NOT BUY THIS! I regret it. Play the original, at least it WORKS.

I know not liking Half-life is basically Herasy, but this game really didn't age well.  It's not just the bland graphics, but the controls are sloppy and the fights are unexciting.  I really liked this game when it came out, but now it's like trying to go back and play Golden Eye.  It just doesn't live up to my fond memories.

DONT BUY THIS TODAY

Купив Half-Life: Source вместо оригинальной части я даже и не догадывался какую ошибку я сделал.

Я представлял себе в голове качественное переиздание классики с чуть лучшей графикой, физикой, и HD текстурками, и бережным переносом каждой детали из оригинала.
В результате я получил кривое, убогое, забагованное поделие, в которое мне было стыдно играть.

Я сейчас не говорю, о каких то мелких багах, которые не очень то и заметны, а о конкретных ДЫРАХ, которые портят геймплей.
Например:
[list][*]Первый раз когда учёный встречает солдата, и радостно бежит к нему, крича "Урааа, военные приехали, спасите нас". Все мы помним что происходит дальше. Учёного ждёт смертельный сюрприз.
В Half Life Source военный пробегает МИМО учёного, начинает стрелять в вас, а учёный в это время ИСЧЕЗАЕТ КАК ПРИВИДЕНИЕ.
[*]Помните 3 безумные клешни, которые долбят всех и каждого своими мощными когтями? В Half Life Source они не наносят вам абсолютно никакого урона. Тоесть вы видите как по вам бьют, но урона нету. Ну это же просто бред...
[*]Включив HD текстуры, у вас пропадёт звук дробовика, и не только он. Он станет стрелять как будто на нём супер-глушитель.
[*]Убрали расчленёнку. Что совсем больные штоле, это же была моя самая любимая забава в Half-Life, подойти к трупу с ломиком и дыщ дыщ дыщ дыщ.
[*]Измененили прозрачность воды, из за чего махач с огромной рыбой теперь не актуален, потому что её чётко видно, соотвественно этот момент в игре тупо слили.
[/list]
И много других подобных вещей, которые тебя неприятно удивляют КАЖДЫЙ уровень.

Покупки заслуживает только великолепный оригинальный Half-Life!  Source - это какое то позорище. 1/10.

Half Life really put other games I've played into perspective. I've always had my hand held, always had a little floating marker telling me, "Go here, push this, kill that." I've always been showered in health, just so I don't go crying to mommy because I was't taking cover. But not in half life. The puzzles are tough and not thoroughly explained, so I found myslef checking the walkthrough often (FYI, I am stupid). I still found it fun, and the platforming wan't overly impossible. What I liked most about HL was the combat. In CoD or some other modern shooter, you crouch behind a wall for 5 seconds and your bullet holes magicaly heal themselves. In Half Life, you can get knocked down to 2 health with no medkits nearby. It is then that the stakes are raised higher than any spunk-gargle weewee shooter(From [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuNN1D-FCjs]Zero Punctuation[/url]). You have to fight your way to a medkit while avoiding any kind of damage, since a tiny papercut to your pinky will kill you. Then when you finaly get said medkit, it gives a sense of accomplishment that you can never get from gunning down countless foriengers from behind a brown chest-high wall.

Overall, a very fun game and a good representation of how games have changed.

Half-Life: Source-культовая игра,которая понравилась многим, мне в том числе.Халфа стала эталоном игроиндустрии.Тогда разрабы доказали,что это игра-легенда,легенда,которая выиграла многие призы.В этом обзоре я хочу рассказать почему стоит поиграть и пройти каждому геймеру.Халфа-это чудо!Я достаточно долго мечтал в неё поиграть.И вот чудо свершилось,мне удалось её пройти и рассказать вам о ней.А сейчас давайте перейдём к плюсам и минусам данной игры.
Плюсы:
1.Геймплей.Хоть и будет глупо писать обзор о этой игре,но рассказать новичкам я обязан.Игра стала мощным прорывом в игроиндустрии.Мне безумно понравился геймплей в этой игре и сказать что-то плохое про него я не могу,он очень классный и в него интересно играть.
2.Сюжет.В Халфе мне очень понравился сюжет,который может завлечь надолго.Про игру я могу говорить часами и игра произвела на меня большое впечатление.
3.Сложность.В меру сложная,в меру простая и интересная.

Минусы:
1.Оптимизация.Да,да у такое великой игры есть минусы, сама оптимизация нельзя сказать, что отвратная, но меня бесило, то что комбенизон на русском языке, а учёные говорят на английском.
2.Незначимость Сурса.Это не очень большой минус т.к. многим нравится именно Сурс версия, а не оригинал.Мой совет, если у вас есть оригинал, не стоит покупать вам Сурс версию

Вердикт:Игра-легенда,по которой до сих пор делают мемы,которую до сих пор проходят и любят её.Это игра-это просто нечто.10 из 10.Рекомендую каждому попробовать этот шедевр и оценить его.

Half-Life: Source is the original Half-Life ported to the source engine. The source engine gives the game a slight graphical update, but it also causes some performance issues not present in the original game, such as longer loading times. It's also not entirely one to one with the original because of the source engine, but I still think it's overall faithful to the original game. Give it a try unless you can't dare to play anything other than the original version.
Wish I had known about this remastered version of Half Life before i played through the entire game lol
Horrible remake
Симулятор смерти от падения с высоты. 10/10

Graphics and Bugs:

This game is an original Half-Life but on the source engine. Which means better graphics and less bugs and glitches. On the original Half-Life the sound could not be heard sometimes, here its fixed. But really rare there is a ladder bug when you jump on ladder and it knocks you off (requires restart) and basically thats it.

Difficulty and genre:

Luckily the game was developed a long ago, when the story was not very important, when developers were adding much more action than in modern games. Yeah of cource it has story, and events but nothing complicated. The athmosphere and action are something to enjoy in this game. It is difficult even on easy difficulty to find where to go, or just complete the chapters (some take 1-2 hours). But I would call it ''challenging'' instead of ''omg sucks'' or ''too hard''

The start and end of game:

The start was clear, whole chapter spent on introduction which is kind of needed to be done. The end [spoiler]had some kind of mystery, and some questions could be asked. Has two endings, and you can only hope what Gordon is going to choose.[/spoiler]

Rating:
I would give this game 9/10. First played in 2015, and it is a game for all the times!

This game is freaking amazing.
Enough said.
